text.__SUMMARY__: Psychotria sodiroi is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.
text.Sources: Jaramillo, T.; Cornejo, X. & Pitman, N. (2004). "Psychotria sodiroi". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2004: e.T46105A11033414. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2004.RLTS.T46105A11033414.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
